reviews.review: Realmente sensacional. A valve conseguiu pegar todos os elementos positivos do primeiro Portal e expandir incrivelmente  o jogo. A GlaDOS é realemente a melhor vilã dos games e a adição de jogo co-op deu uma longevidade muito grande ao jogo. Adorei tudo nele! Espqero que logo venha mais.

While the story line and puzzles are mindblowing yet again. It will never make the same impression that portal 1 did. They did add co-op now so those should give a few headache and funny moments.

Anyone who played portal 1 for the story line, should definitly get this asset. 8/10

Thia game takes a regular puzzle game and adds a lot depth and backstory; our main protaganist, Chell, is trapped in a abandoned science facilty, Aperture Laboratories. You must guide Chell through Aperture Laboratories's traps bottomless pits, with the aid of of the portal gun.  The amount of puzzles that GLaDOS (Genetic Life and Disc Operating System) throws at you seem limitless. I would highy suggest playing this game, playing with a friend is again awesome.
2 portals

Fantastic, delightful, clever and funny - Portal 2 is Portal 1 amped up and fleshed out into an excellent Single Player (and Co-op) Experience. If you are tired of in-your-face FPS and frantic games, this is one of the best alternatives. I think it will be remembered as a classic (along with the first one) for years and years to come.....and I haven't even tried any of the Community Test Chambers yet ;)

I'm not exactly the world's biggest gamer. In fact, I only picked up "Portal 2" because I'm a huge Stephen Merchant fan. That being said, I don't think I've ever had so much fun playing a video game. (At least, not since I was a kid sneaking turns at "Mortal Kombat" with my brother and my cousin.) It's part puzzle, part shooter, all ridiculous fun. Even when I fail a test chamber, I have to laugh because both villains never fail to mock you for being an idiot. Highly, highly recommended for people who may not think they're the video game type, as well as people who've been gaming their whole lives.
Captivating!
Un pur moment d'anthologie !

Buy Portal 2... Seriously buy it now. If you haven't played this game from begining to end yet than do youself a favor and do it know. Especially if you're getting tired of the same old shoot em up gameplay of almost every game on the market. Valve took a game that was already ground breaking(portal), and injected it with steroids, and a little crack mixed in. Complex and entertaining puzzles, a intriging storyline, and full of well written humor. Well done Valve, well done.

its so goood

Portal 2 is the sequal to one of the most amazing 3D puzzle platformers of all time. Your portal gun is the same, but you're methods have expanded immensly. Use Lazers, spring-loaded plates, new cubes, and so many more tools! New characters include the voice of Apperture's President, Cave Johnson and The charmingly morronic Wheatly (Voiced by the hilarious Stephen Merchant). These are but a few examples. For an even greater challenge (and a completely independant story line from single player), grab a buddy and play the Multiplayer game with two adorable robots put through tests even Chell(main character from single player) would never have been put through! I recomend this game just as highly as I would the first installment. If you liked Portal, you will love Portal 2.
Buy & play.  It's as simple as that.

A lot of my expectations were met - the humour and the testing rooms were great and  the game was a joy to play. I'd appreciate if there were more of the rooms, but this way it at least didn't get repetitive. But the game really wasn't as good as the first one. I was jumping around in the darkness, testing rooms nowhere to be found, and suddenly I realized - this isn't a portal puzzle game anymore, it's a lame platformer. Too often the only problem was finding a place where I could place a portal - i.e. not fun at all. Overall, recommended, but worse than part one.

Portal 2 является продолжением экшн-головоломки Portal. Сюжет игры развивается спустя несколько лет после первой части. В роли главной героини вновь выступит девушка по имени Челл, и ей предстоит побывать на неизведанных территориях Лаборатории исследования природы порталов. Она вновь повстречается с ГЛэДОС. Кроме одиночной кампании, в Portal 2 вас ждет кооперативная игра со своей сюжетной линией, которая все же связана с историей однопользовательского режима.

This game is brilliant. The puzzles are amazing. The way an interesting plot is created and woven into the game sets it far apart from any other puzzle game. Humor is a constant part of the gameplay, with dialogue bringing a lot of depth and purpose to the at times tricky puzzles. Challenging, but not impossible, the game can be played through (with some thought) by anyone. Must buy!
Portal 2 is an amazing game. The single player story is top-notch and the co-operative mode is incredibly fun with a friend. I highly recommend this game.

If you liked the first one you'll love this one even more.  Little bit more story, the Workshop and COOP!!  The coop is fantastic and a great addition to the game.  For the most part the graphics and gameplay are the same minus having a friend with you this time around.  There is a boss fight at the end of the SP portion of the game, but not with the coop side of it.  Why not?  Why isn't there a boss for coop?  Maybe we'll see that in part 3?  Let's hope so.  Single player is fun and Coop is even better.  Grab it on sale or pay full price.  It's worth it!  FUN!

Portal raggiunge i suoi massimi con questo nuovo lunghissimo capitolo,oltre alla modalità single player con una campagna bella lunga avremo anche la campagna a 2 giocatori con enigmi nuovi da risolvere in 2.Inoltre nuovi elementi come raggi portanti da sfruttare a nostro vantaggio tramite i portali ed un editor di livelli per creare le nostre sfide per gli altri.Molto bello

[url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/620/] Portal 2 [/url] is a mind bending game that forces you to think in three demensions. Possibly the best puzzle game ever created, with an extremely high replay value. Valve has released the software they used to create the game for free, so anybody can create custom portal mini games. The game is constantly evolving thanks to the content created by the portal community. Here is a map I made, but you must own the game on steam to play it.

[/url] Here is a list of [url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198057021599/myworkshopfiles/?appid=0&sort=score&browsefilter=myfavorites&view=imagewall] My Favorites. Portal 2 Is a game where you play as the silent protagonist 'Chell' in Aperture Laboratories or as one of two testing robots in the cooperative initiative. This game revolves around the one thing that aperture has time and time again proven is it's most valuable item, the Aperture Science handheld portal device, There are multiple versions but they come in two phases, singular and dual portal, with the singular, you can only place one portal. The dual alternative, you get the idea. Portal 2 revolves around puzzles in rooms and physics to get there, and it's all thanks to the man, Cave Johnson. Why buy it? It's a great game that doesn't just end at the end of the campaign / singleplayer / story, There's coop mode which allows you to buddy up locally or over the net, maybe even with a stranger if necessary. Even once you finish that there's more, community-made tests. There are so many you'd be there for a whileif you plan to finish all of them. Why do people say cave hates lemons? Who is wheatley? Why is GLaDOS calling me a monster? "Let me answer those questions with a question: Who wants to make sixty dollars? Cash." Not really, just stop asking questions and see it for yourself.
This game was great.  Fun and challenging throughout with an incredibly satisfying ending.
